sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import Pdf from "react-to-pdf"; const ref=React.createRef() const PDF=(props)=>{ return( <>
    FORM - 3 [rule 4 (1)]
    AFFIDAVIT OF CLAIMANT/ PARENT(S)
    (Rule 4, Order 18 of the Code of Civil Procedure, 1908)

    I, .. {props.fullName} son / daughter of Shri{props.fatherName}aged {props.age} years, Occupation {props.occupation} residing at {props.village} village,Taluka {props.taluka},{props.district} Disrict {props.state} State here by Solemnly affirm as under

    2. I hereby give the genealogy tree of my family and relatives, which is as under: -


    3. Other relevant submissions to be made or any essential explanation to be made, in support of
    Caste /Tribe claim, including the sociology, anthropological and ethnological (anthropological
    moorings and ethnology kinship), genetical traits, of the Caste/Tribes, if any;
    To the best of my knowledge and be lief the information given in application FORM -1 and in this affidavit is based on facts and is correct.

    Identifier Details- I {props.s1}{props.fullname2}, Resident at {props.village}, Tal. {props.taluka}, Dist. {props.district}. Before me, Shri. {props.fullName} has given his signature and thumbprint and I declare that I know him personally. {props.fullname2} VERIFICATION It is certified that Mr. {props.fullName} signed and took oath before me. {props.fullname2}, Personally identified, whose signed affidavit has been affixed to me. Verified on 05/10/2017 at Amalner that the contents of the above mentioned affidavit is true and correct and nothing material has been concealed. Place : Amalner. (Sign. Before Me) Date : 05.10.2017. Executive Magistrate Amalner
{({ toPdf })=>}
) } export default PDF;
